text: Had several issues with the ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB74 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

The ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB74 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

The ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB74 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB74 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Call of Duty: Warzone, and the performance throttles significantly. The battery life has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG GL503VD-DB74 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
